deal.features:
- The Base model comes with a combination and stair tool
- The Animal model adds a tangle-free turbine tool for pet hair
- The Animal Frankenstein has five or six other tools [(see chart)](https://i.cloudup.com/XZsqMgWuwY-3000x3000.png)
- Sadistically traps debris in a transparent, cylindrical prison, so they have no choice but to stare at the room they once roamed so freely
- Model: DC41
deal.title: Dyson DC41 Base, Animal, or Animal Frankenstein (Refurbished)
deal.specifications:
Specs 
=== 
**All Models** 
- 17.1 lbs 
- Radial Root Cyclone technology 
- Ball technology 
- Self-adjusting cleaner head 
- Engineered for pet hair pickup 
- Suitable for all floor types 
- 15.4 ft hose 
- 35 ft cord 
- 51 ft Max Reach 
- 13.3 in Cleaner head width 
- .55 gal Bin Capacity 
- Bagless 
- Instant Release Wand 
- HEPA Filtration 
- 235 a/w Suction Power 
- Combination and Stair Tool 

**DC41 Animal includes above plus** 
- Tangle Free Turbine Tool 

**DC41 Animal Frankenstein (our own diabolical creation) includes above plus** 
- Soft Dusting Brush 
- Multi-Angle Brush 
- Mattress Tool 
- Flexi-Crevice Tool 
- Flatout Head Tool 

![Comparison](https://i.cloudup.com/XZsqMgWuwY-3000x3000.png) 

**Condition** - Refurbished
**Warranty** - 6 Month Dyson + [6 Month Mediocre](https://meh.com/warranty) (1 Year total) 
**Estimated Delivery:** 4/17 - 4/24
- $5 Shipping, Free with **[VMP](http://mediocre.com/vmp)** 

What's in the Box? 
=== 
#### DC41 Base 
- Operating Manual 
- Quickstart Guide 
- Combination and Stair Tool 
- Product Registration Card 

#### DC41 Animal with Tangle Free Turbine Vacuum 
- Operating Manual 
- Quickstart Guide 
- Tangle Turbine Head 
- Combination and Stair Tool 
- Product Registration Card 

#### DC41 Animal Frankenstein Vacuum 
*DC41 Frankenstein Accessories shipped in separate box and may deliver on different date* 
- Operating Manual 
- Quick Start Guide 
- Product Registration Card 
- Combination and Stair Tool 
- Tangle-Free Turbine Tool 
- Flexi-Crevice Tool 
- Multi-Angle Brush 
- Mattress Tool 
- Flatout Head Tool 
- Soft Dusting Brush 

Pictures 
=== 
[DC41](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1406664669/wsblgnjphsfnyqe1acv8.png) 
[Animal](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1428704477/rdi1ystgbjxwqq5ih5us.png)
[Frankenstein](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1406666177/tuv8zbxw6fmixsmeiccd.png) 
[Top view](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1419956654/xg3gleehyckvdwiegjlu.png) 
[Turbine tool](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1419957085/s8sjfjmilgpphn76h1vb.png) 
[Knock the crap out of your carpet](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1419962474/jhtoara44fyhf8k8uibz.png) 
[Dump it](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1419962268/lp68nko9bujn3gkob4ya.png) 
[Long-distance vacuuming](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1419963195/gelxrtdlkmm7dqpgtkmy.png) 
[Meow](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1428356420/vaqfwhnfhuxcrpemz3zs.png)

Price Check 
=== 
[DC41 Multi Floor (refurbished) is $355.91 at Amazon (40 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-DC41-Upright-Vacuum-Refurbished/dp/B009XJAQSU/?tag=meh0ec-20) 

[DC41 Animal w/ Tangle Free Turbine Tool (New) is $396.89 at Amazon (297 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-DC41-Animal-Upright-Vacuum/dp/B00B61PUT8/?tag=meh0ec-20) 

DC41 Frankenstein includes [Multi-Floor](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-DC41-Upright-Vacuum-Refurbished/dp/B009XJAQSU/?tag=meh0ec-20) and Additional Gear Kit: 
[Tangle Free Turbine Tool is $62.94 at Amazon (343 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-Tangle-Free-Tool-Turbine/dp/B008SH85J0/?tag=meh0ec-20) 
[Mattress Tool is $29 at Amazon (67 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-48-Mattress-Tool/dp/B000ANKHBE/ref=pd_sim_hg_9?tag=meh0ec-20/ie=UTF8&refRID=1AY635QYXV4C99E6WQ9R) 
[Flexi-Crevice Tool is $29 at Amazon (111 reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-36-Flexi-Crevice-Tool/dp/B000AO1HT4/ref=pd_sim_hg_1?tag=meh0ec-20/ie=UTF8&refRID=1G1BD93BDD1G8MTQC90H) 
[Soft Dusting Brush is $29 at Amazon (246 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-49-Soft-Dusting-Brush/dp/B000ANHPIW/ref=pd_sim_hg_3?tag=meh0ec-20/ie=UTF8&refRID=0N5KSAD7Z4Y1AJC5ME8B) 
[Flatout Head Tool is $47 at Amazon (196 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-Flatout-Head-Tool/dp/B002SYJO80/?tag=meh0ec-20) 
[Multi-Angle Brush Attachment is $29.49 at Amazon (84 Reviews)](http://www.amazon.com/Dyson-122-Multi-Angle-Brush-Attachment/dp/B000V53CO0/?tag=meh0ec-20)

story.title: Vacuumly Asked Questions
story.body:
*The Dyson DC41 again? Haven't you guys sold this before?*

Yes. [This one time](https://meh.com/deals/dyson-dc-41), [this other time](https://meh.com/deals/dyson-dc41-animal-or-animal-complete--refurbished-), and [this time, too](https://meh.com/deals/dyson-dc-41-1). Today makes four times.

*Is it because you don't have anything else to sell?*

No. It's because people like vacuums. Dysons and Roombas have always been the most requested items from our customers, dating back to our Woot days. 

And it's because we're set up to be kind of an impulse-buy store, but a Dyson DC41 is on the pricey side for an impulse buy, even at this price. If we can, we like to give people a little while to think about it before the next time it comes around.

*What's the difference between these three options?*

The Dyson DC41 **Base** model includes a Dyson DC41. The **Animal** model includes a tangle-free turbine head. The **Animal Frankenstein** model includes a bundle of other tools we put together. Check the specs for details.

*Did you love one of your parents more than the other?*

Not more than, but differently than. Our mother was warm and affectionate. Her love was a blanket she wrapped around us to keep the cold world from chilling our little noses. Our father was proud, strong, never unkind, but emotionally distant and hard to embrace. It wasn't until adulthood that we realized why: because he was a saguaro cactus. Hiding that fact from us was the way he showed his love.

*I'm seeing this vacuum cleaner for the first time. Should I buy it?*

If you want it? Probably. But if you'd rather think it over, you'll probably have another shot at it before too long. We've kinda got a hookup with refurbed Dysons, so they pop up here pretty regularly. Just ask our good friends in the forum. They'll tell you all about it, sometimes in very colorful terms. 

*Which Holy Roman Emperor engaged in a lifelong quest to discover the legendary Philosopher's Stone, and once had a horoscope prepared for him by Nostradamus?*

[Rudolf II](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rudolf_II,_Holy_Roman_Emperor).

*Do you have any animated GIFs that can inspire me to work out more?*
 
![no agony, no bragony][1]

*Do I really need a vacuum cleaner?*

We're pretty sure that people who have to ask that question need vacuum cleaners worst of all.


  [1]: https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1428379743/bv0hmdotjr9mbmblr3ef.gif

answers.text: Yes, regularly, and I'll never go back
Yes, but only under special circumstances
No, but I would if I could
Some other answer you'll mop, dust, sweep, and polish in the forum
